channel.title: 459 Project!
channel.description:
[b][center][size=18pt]Edited! Switched bases![font=georgia][/font][/size][/center]
Hello. I'm anchorman and I'm starting a 459 Hyperion based project. Although I can code pretty well myself, help is always appreciated. What I am Needing: [b][center][size=18pt]Someone who can add godswords[/size][/center][/b] [b]Server Coders[/b] [code] Someone who is good with Hyperion. Someone who can add MYSQL through Hyperion. [/code] [b]Client Coders[/b] [code] A experienced client coder for some things. [/code] [b]Web Developers - I am good at this my self but help is always appreciated.[/b] [code] Someone experienced with MYSQL for webclient/highscores/etc. Someone experienced with SMF. I like smf more than MyBB. [/code] [b]Graphics Designers[/b] [code] Someone to maker banners for server. Someone to make custom forum ranks and icons [/code] [b]Host[/b] [code]Possibly looking for a host. We have VPS but eclipse isn't working.[/code]
If you would like to help, you can email me at emma_volleysoccer@msn.com or our forums are [url=http://www.cloudnine.net76.net]here[/url].
P.S. I get socketed a lot through msn so you may want to send me a e-mail.
If forums aren't supposed to be in thread, a moderator please remove. :) Thanks.
Thanks, Wise Old Man

item.title: 459 Project!
item.dc:creator: @alc125msn alc125msn
item.description:
@alc125msn wrote:

[b][center][size=18pt]Edited! Switched bases![font=georgia][/font][/size][/center]

Hello. I’m anchorman and I’m starting a 459 Hyperion based project. Although I can code pretty well myself, help is always appreciated.
What I am Needing:
[center][size=18pt]Someone who can add godswords[/size][/center]
Server Coders

Someone who is good with Hyperion.
Someone who can add MYSQL through Hyperion.

Client Coders

A experienced client coder for some things.

Web Developers - I am good at this my self but help is always appreciated.

Someone experienced with MYSQL for webclient/highscores/etc.
Someone experienced with SMF. I like smf more than MyBB.

Graphics Designers

Someone to maker banners for server.
Someone to make custom forum ranks and icons

Host

Possibly looking for a host. We have VPS but eclipse isn't working.

If you would like to help, you can email me at emma_volleysoccer@msn.com or our forums are here.

P.S. I get socketed a lot through msn so you may want to send me a e-mail.

If forums aren’t supposed to be in thread, a moderator please remove. Thanks.

Thanks,
Wise Old Man

Read full topic
